replies.bodyText:
I am pretty sure you and I have the same push access and pushing to a PR works for me.
This is what I do:

Add a git remote for the user's fork (using ssh, not https as the protocol) - for example foo
Check out the PR in a branch, say pull/1234
Make changes and commit
Push like so: git push foo pull/1234:name-of-branch-in-users-fork
